greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{1 <= x_1 <= x_2 <= ... <= x_n <= n} gcd(x_1, x_2, ... , x_n, n).
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[n/#] * Binomial[n + # - 1, n] &]; Array[a, 25] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 18 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 17 2021
